author: jukka
msg: JCRSITE-13: Use the org.apache:apache:6 parent POM
Upgrade to version 6 of the Apache parent POM and remove plugin settings that are already specified there.
Move the license header inside the <project/> element to avoid problems with the Maven release plugin.
